attributes.action: implement more, not less, stringent laws on the owning of reptiles as pets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exotic pets and in particular snakes, can be extremely dangerous. Even those that are not venemous can cause great distress to some members of the community. The owning of these animals should be strictly limited to zoos or animal centres where they can be appropriately contained. They should not, under any circumstances, be available to people who are not responsible or cannot guarantee they will not escape.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
